derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: French, later form of rondel (see rondel)

means.word_mean: 1. a musical form that is often the last movement of a sonata
2. a French verse form of 10 or 13 lines running on two rhymes; the opening phrase is repeated as the refrain of the second and third stanzas
